subject: Re: Simsonn Order Shipment Confirmation
description_text:
Thank you for the update and the wishes
Hopefully things will get to normal quickly

On Thu, 19 Jun 2025 at 14:11 SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote:

> SIMSONN <https://www.simsonn.com>
>
> Hi, your order package is ready, but due to the war, there is no logistics
> channel from China to Israel for the time being. We will ship your order
> when the logistics is restored. Protect yourself and wish you all the best
> my friend .
>
> If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at
> service@simsonn.com
>

conversations.body_text: Hi Maor Ben Zvi,  Yes, we also hope everything will come to an end soon so that everyone can return to normal life. We will closely monitor the latest developments to ensure your order is handled promptly and keep you updated at all times.

Hey
Look like things are returning to normal
Are there any updates on the shipping situation?

Hi Maor Ben Zvi,   We have enquired with the logistics provider and they are still waiting for the situation to stabilise, we will be pressing them daily and will update you when the goods are dispatched.

Hey any updates on the current situation of deliveries?
I read that many places have already got back to delivering regulary

On Wed, 25 Jun 2025 at 13:32 service@simsonn.com
Hi Maor Ben Zvi,  Please provide your order number again so I can help check the shipping status for you.
SSN1751

Hi Maor Ben Zvi,     We are contacting more logistics providers for viable shipping options. One is currently available to ship, but the price is unacceptable to us and we will wait for an update from him.
Any updates?
Hi Maor Ben Zvi,    We have been keeping an eye on the logistics and should be able to ship your order in the next couple of days, thank you for your patience.

Awesome
Btw would you be able to declare the price paid is under 50 usd? This Would
help me out if you do
Hi Maor Ben Zvi,  Of course, but there is a risk that the parcel will be searched and you may be liable for customs fines if the parcel is searched.

Let’s risk it haha
If you can put the price at 67 usd it will be a good number I believe
Any updates on the shipment?

Hi Maor Ben Zvi,   Sorry, we still don't have a suitable channel to ship for you, there is currently a logistics provider offering 1230 RMB, almost 171.45 USD, which is unaffordable for us. We have three options at the moment:  1. Wait for the opening of the logistic channel before shipping for you;  2. you need to share the $49 logistics cost, we use this logistics provider to ship the product for you, and it is expected to be delivered in 5-7 days;  3. we will give you a full refund.  We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience!

It depends how long the wait will be?
I have order a wheel and base at the same time that I ordered the pedals
and the wheel and base just got here with no extra cost for delivery
and what is the reason for the high price of delivery?
If it will take a long time to get a normal low price shipping than I might
opt for the 2nd option.
so let me know.

And btw is the usual shipping method takes longer than 5-7 days? or is it
the same?
thanks.

On Wed, Jul 9, 2025 at 2:00 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Maor Ben Zvi,     If we wait, we can't be sure of the timing, as our dedicated logistics provider will not open the logistics until the situation is completely stabilized. The timeframe offered by this logistics provider is about 5-7 days. ME. ME. If this is acceptable to you, you can click on the link to pay for shipping and we will send it out for you immediately.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2

ok I have paid the difference.
please send asap and update me
thanks


On Thu, Jul 10, 2025 at 10:54 AM service@simsonn.com

Hey I have paid a few days ago but stil no updates?
What’s up?
Let me know

Hey
Why no response from you?

Hi Maor Ben Zvi,    Sorry, your package was sent out to the logistics provider warehouse last Friday. The logistics provider sent it out yesterday and provided the international logistics number, but we are on vacation so we didn't update you in time. The parcel is currently on its way to Israel, and the logistics will be updated when the parcel arrives in Israel and is picked up by the local Fedex. https://www.track718.us/en/detail?nums=882744973283

Hey again

It has been 7 days since I have paid you the delivery and it looks like the
package isn't even half way here.
It's pretty disappointing at this point as I received my wheel and base a
week ago while ordering at the same time...
Why did I pay extra?

Hi Maor Ben Zvi, this is the only channel we are able to ship through, and this is the first time we have worked with this logistics provider, there may be some delays in logistics, but it shouldn't be too long, I hope you can understand. Sincerely apologize!

I understand but if the claim is 5-7 days and I pay extra 50 usd and it
takes 10 days or even more than that there should be some accountability
and a compensation wouldn’t you agree?
